name: Deployment Process - Production Release Workflow
content:
Production Deployment Process Documentation

Pre-Deployment Checklist:

  1. Code Review

    • All PRs approved

    • Security scan completed

    • Test coverage > 80%

  2. Environment Preparation

    • Database backup

    • Config validation

    • Resource scaling check

Deployment Steps:

  1. Stage Deployment

    • Deploy to staging: `kubectl apply -f staging/`

    • Run integration tests

    • Verify metrics

  2. Production Release

    • Create release branch

    • Tag version

    • Execute: `make deploy-prod`

Post-Deployment:

  • Monitor error rates

  • Check performance metrics

  • Verify user flows

Rollback Procedure:

  1. Execute: `make rollback version=X.Y.Z`

  2. Verify system stability

  3. Notify stakeholders
